sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SAVE, a river of Germany, which has its ſource in Upper Carniola, on the frontiers of Carinthia. — It runs through Carniola from weſt to eaſt, afterwards ſeparates Sclavonia from Croatia, Boſnia, and part of Servia, and then falls into the Danube at Belgrade.
